title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, making them stand out as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which further exacerbates the issue.
EB: The Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog should not use text fields. Instead, a different user interface element or styling should be used to present the information. This change will ensure consistency and improve the overall appearance on motif platforms.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Properties dialog. 
2. Navigate to the Project Properties Info page. 
3. Observe the appearance of the text fields on motif platforms.
